name: QuickBooks 2016 for Mac Data File
summary: A QB2016 file is a data file created by the 2016 version of QuickBooks for Mac, a financial management application. It contains company financial data, which includes employee profiles, payroll information, and customer data. QB2016 file can be used to generate invoices, financial reports, tax forms, and more.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
